org.kiji.rest
Class KijiRESTConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Configuration
      org.kiji.rest.KijiRESTConfiguration

public class KijiRESTConfiguration
extends com.yammer.dropwizard.config.Configuration

The Java object which is deserialized from the YAML configuration file. This parametrizes the KijiRESTService.
